plot: A pair of detectives from Scotland Yard are assigned to look into the disappearance of the Mukkinese Battle Horn, a ninth-century artifact, from the Metropolitan Museum.
title: The Case of the Mukkinese Battle-Horn
plot_es: A pair of detectives from Scotland Yard are assigned to look into the disappearance of the Mukkinese Battle Horn, a ninth-century artifact, from the Metropolitan Museum.
original_name: The Case of the Mukkinese Battle-Horn
plot_en: A pair of detectives from Scotland Yard are assigned to look into the disappearance of the Mukkinese Battle Horn, a ninth-century artifact, from the Metropolitan Museum.

cast.role: Narrator /              Supt. Quilt /              Asst. Commissioner Sir Jervis Fruit /              Henry Crun
cast.name: Peter Sellers
